page.title: 09AGRICULTURE
page.content: The farms in our area are mostly{mixed farms i.e.they grow crops and rear beasts.At Thorney Close farm the owner had to take down the hedges and fences so that he could get the combined harvester into the fields.The land is{arable}that means it is fit for ploughing.The farms are generally from 100 to l50 acres in size. At Thorney Close farm,Mr Kennedy the farmer grows barley,wheat and rape.He keeps cows,sheep and chickens but he only keeps cows for beef.Milk production is very time demanding and he has been{farming}for forty years.The farmers grow barley because it brings a lot of money at market.The barley in our area is mainly used for brewing beer.
